title: Distance Education Program Based on Creative Instructional Design for Strengthening Veterinary Technician Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of veterinary medicine and animal care
context.additional_context: Practice-focused education program for current veterinary technicians. Combines simulations using digital devices with offline practical training

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform mathematical calculations (e.g., medication dosage, diagnostic value interpretation) for solving veterinary problems.
Learners can logically explain data-driven clinical judgments through analysis of animal patient cases.
Learners can systematically diagnose mathematical errors occurring during veterinary skill applications in team-based projects and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
